column1: Smoque BBQ////My ribs were good. I liked the tangy sauce
column2: but I didn't need a lot of it because the meat was smoked well
column3: so it wasn't dry. The meat was tender and while I find the description of meat as "falling off the bone" pretty disgusting
column4: this meat did come off easily without being too fatty. They're really the only reason I am giving Smoque 3 stars instead of 2 (even with the extra star for smell alone).
